clauses.title: Prohibits political discussions which are against the government-advocated value
clauses.description: Political content, which is against the government-advocated value, in the form or pictures, discussions, or campaigning isn’t allowed. Since it encourages the promotional content of the value, the service may tolerate trolling or spamming against political rivals or enemies.
clauses.clause_text:

case.text: Political discussions which are against the government-advocated value are prohibited

clauses.title: You must provide your identifiable information
clauses.description: The Service requires users to provide their identifiable information, including phone number, iD number or other information, even though this data collection isn’t essential for the purposes of the service. They may still allow pseudonyms in the foreground.
clauses.clause_text:
你在注册豆瓣账号时提供的信息
注册并登录豆瓣账号时，需要你提供手机号码、电子邮箱或第三方账号（微信、QQ、微博 ）的信息，我们将通过发送短信验证码或邮件的方式来验证你的账号是否有效。

case.text: You must provide your identifiable information

clauses.title: The service can delete your account without prior notice and without a reason
clauses.description: At any time, your account can be terminated without explanation and without warning by the service.
clauses.clause_text: 你同意豆瓣基于其自行之考虑，因任何理由，包含但不限于缺乏使用，或豆瓣认为你已经违反本使用协议，终止你的账号或本服务之使用（或服务之任何部分），并将你在本服务内任何内容加以移除并删除。你同意依本使用协议任何规定提供���服务，无需进行事先通知即可中断或终止。

case.text: Your account can be deleted or permanently suspended without prior notice and without a reason

clauses.title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is less friendly to user privacy protection.
clauses.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction known for weak data regulations and poor user privacy protection. Usually contributors will need to explain in the Analysis view of each point linked to this Case the reason why it shall be applied.
clauses.clause_text: 豆瓣将根据中国法律、本协议、《豆瓣隐私政策》的规定收集、存储、使用和透露你的个人信息。

case.text: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is less friendly to user privacy protection.

clauses.title: Your data is processed and stored in a country that is less friendly to user privacy protection
clauses.description: This case means that user data is not anywhere in the world, but somewhere where it is more likely to be obtained and used by government and/or possible data analysts.
clauses.clause_text: 我们在中华人民共和国境内收集和产生的个人信息，将存储在中华人民共和国境内，不会存在个人信息出境之情况。

case.text: Your data is processed and stored in a country that is less friendly to user privacy protection

clauses.title: This service uses your personal information for many different purposes
clauses.description: Personal Data can be processed for many reasons, including non essential processing such as for advertising, marketing and analytics purposes.
clauses.clause_text: 我们会在下列情况下使用你的个人信息：

case.text: Your personal information is used for many different purposes

clauses.title: This service provides archives of their Terms of Service so that changes can be viewed over time
clauses.description: This case applies to Services whose agreements provide previous versions, so that users can compare them and understand how the Service seems to evolve regarding user rights.
clauses.clause_text: 查看历史版本

case.text: Archives of their agreements are provided so that changes can be viewed over time

clauses.title: This service respects your browser's Do Not Track (DNT) headers
clauses.description: This service does respect the browser's Do Not Track header and disables all user tracking if it is enabled.
clauses.clause_text: 很多网络浏览器均设有 Do Not Track 功能，该功能可向网站发布 Do Not Track 请求。目前，主要互联网标准组织尚未设立相关政策来规定网站应如何应对此类请求。但如果你的浏览器启用了 Do Not Track，那么我们的网站都会尊重你的选择。

case.text: Your browser's Do Not Track (DNT) headers are respected

clauses.title: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect
clauses.description: The Privacy Policy describes in detail the data collected through the website and through the services provided.
clauses.clause_text:

case.text: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service

clauses.title: This service prohibits users sending chain letters, junk mail, spam or any unsolicited messages.
clauses.description: Users are not allowed to use the service for chain letters, junk mail, spamming or any other distribution of content to people who have not agreed to receiving it.
clauses.clause_text:
Full Text: "你同意将不会利用本服务进行任何违法或不正当的活动，包括但不限于下列行为∶
6）将任何“广告信函”、“促销资料”、“垃圾邮件”、“滥发信件”、“连锁信件”、“直销”或其他任何形式的劝诱资料加以发布、发送或以其它方式传送"

case.text: You are prohibited from sending chain letters, junk mail, spam or any unsolicited messages

clauses.clause_text: 同时，如果豆瓣有理由认为你的任何行为，包括但不限于你的任何言论或其它行为违反或可能违反国家法律法规的任何规定，豆瓣可在任何时候不经任何事先通知终止向你提供服务。

case.text: Your account can be suspended for several reasons

clauses.title: This service informs users that its Terms of Service does not apply to third party websites
clauses.description: The service states that whenever it links to third party websites or applications, its Terms of Service does not apply. Those third party websites or applications hosted or operated by other organizations may have their Terms of Service.

clauses.title: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided
clauses.description: This service makes no warranty regarding the accuracy or reliability of any information that is given on its website or the results that may be obtained from the use of the service.
clauses.clause_text: Full Text: "2）豆瓣不保证以下事项∶[...] 使用本服务取得之结果正确可靠"

case.text: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided

clauses.title: Failure to enforce any provision of the Terms of Service does not constitute a waiver of such provision
clauses.description: Even if the service does not or not always enforce all of the rules or provisions contained in its terms, they still apply. Users can at a later time still be held accountable for violating provisions that have not been enforced consistently.
clauses.clause_text: 豆瓣未行使或执行本使用协议任何权利或规定，不构成对前述权利或权利之放弃。

case.text: Failure to enforce any provision of the Terms of Service does not constitute a waiver of such provision

clauses.title: Users agree not to use the service for illegal purposes
clauses.description: The user agrees not to commit any unlawful acts through the use of the website, including the posting of illegal content or messaging.
clauses.clause_text: 你同意将不会利用本服务进行任何违法或不正当的活动，包括但不限于下列行为∶

case.text: You agree not to use the service for illegal purposes

clauses.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account
clauses.description: You are responsible for protecting the confidentiality of your password and for maintaining the security of your account. Any activity occurring under your account is your responsibility, whether authorized by you or not.
clauses.clause_text:
Full Text: "4.2 你应对所有使用你的账号的行为负完全的责任。你同意：
1）你的豆瓣账号遭到未获授权的使用，或者发生其它任何安全问题时，你将立即通知豆瓣；
2）如果你未保管好自己的账号和密码，因此而产生的任何损失或损害，豆瓣不承担任何责任；
3）你要对使用账号的所有行为给你、豆瓣或第三方造成的损害负全责，包括你未保管好自己的账号或密码的情形。"

case.text: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

clauses.title: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder
clauses.description: Should any portion of the Terms of Service be unenforceable or invalid, that portion will be enforced to the fullest extent permitted by applicable law and the remainder of the TOS will remain valid and enforceable.
clauses.clause_text: 倘若本使用协议之任何规定因与中华人民共和国法律抵触而无效，本使用协议其他规定仍应具有完整的效力及效果。

case.text: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder

clauses.title: You must report to the service any unauthorized use of your account or any breach of security
clauses.description: The service asks the user to notify them immediately of any unauthorized use or security breaches.
clauses.clause_text:
Full Text: "4.2 你应对所有使用你的账号的行为负完全的责任。你同意：
1）你的豆瓣账号遭到未获授权的使用，或者发生其它任何安全问题时，你将立即通知豆瓣；
2）如果你未保管好自己的账号和密码，因此而产生的任何损失或损害，豆瓣不承担任何责任；
3）你要对使用账号的所有行为给你、豆瓣或第三方造成的损害负全责，包括你未保管好自己的账号或密码的情形。"

case.text: You must report to the service any unauthorized use of your account or any breach of security

clauses.title: This service does not guarantee that it or the products obtained through it meet the users' expectations or requirements
clauses.description: This service provider informs its users that the services, information, products, or other materials provided on its website may not meet the users' expectations or requirements.
clauses.clause_text:
Full Text: "2）豆瓣不保证以下事项∶ 
本服务将符合你的要求；
[...]
你经由本服务购买或取得之任何产品、服务、资讯或其它信息将符合你的期望；"

case.text: This service does not guarantee that it or the products obtained through it meet your expectations or requirements
